resources.string: Involved with computer work more than 2 years
How long in a day you are working on computer? (E.g. 6 Hours)
Are you working on computer continuously or intermittent?
Working on computer for a long time causes pain or discomfort in the body?
Which activity / body posture causes the pain?
Sitting for long period of time
Constantly watching to the desktop screen
Which body part is most painful by working on computer for a long time?
Do you think you need postural and exercise reminders from time to time?
Do you think that maintenance of corrected body posture will improve your work efficiency?
